item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, October 11, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Elon Musk unveils Tesla’s ‘Cybercab’ robotaxis
2. Obama says Black men’s support for Trump is ‘not acceptable’
3. Canadian pension fund director who charged £11,700 to corporate card awarded damages
4. Tesla shares fall after Musk’s glitzy ‘Cybercab’ event disappoints
5. UK executives dump shares on fears of Labour capital gains tax raid
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, October 11, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
